params.data: The vesting data (struct) for this beneficiary.
params.merkleProof: The Merkle proof that verifies `data` is in the Merkle tree.

claimable((address,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: This is a view function for off-chain convenience; the same calculation      is performed internally in `claim()`.

params.data: The vesting data (struct) for this beneficiary.
params.merkleProof: The Merkle proof that verifies `data` is in the Merkle tree.

returns._0: The amount of tokens claimable right now.

constructor.details: Sets up the contract with a given token, Merkle root, and TGE timestamp.

params._merkleRoot: The Merkle root of all vesting data (VestingData leaves).
params._tgeTimestamp: The timestamp from which vesting is computed.
params._token: The ERC20 token to be vested.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._tokenToRescue: The token contract address to rescue.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claim((address,uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Claim any newly vested tokens for the caller, using their Merkle data and proof.

claimable((address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Returns how many tokens a beneficiary can currently claim (at `block.timestamp`),         given their vesting data and the Merkle proof.

merkleRoot().notice: The Merkle root of all vesting records.

rescueTokens(address,uint256).notice: Owner can rescue any tokens accidentally sent here (except for the main vested token).

tgeTimestamp().notice: The timestamp of TGE (when immediate unlock is effective).

totalClaimed(address).notice: Tracks how many tokens have been claimed by each beneficiary so far.         Key = beneficiary address         Value = total tokens claimed to date
